Debian Yubikey packages
=======================

Debian has the following packages:

	Yubikey-ksm
	ykcs11
	yubikey-manager
	yubikey-piv-applet
	pamu2fcfg
	yubikey-personalization
	yubikey-personalization-gui
	scdaemon
	yubikey-totp
	yubioath-desktop
	yubikey-luks


SEE ALSO
--------
	
	https://wiki.debian.org/Smartcards/Yubikey4
	https://wiki.debian.org/DebianSingleSignOn
